about.title: Why Are We Here?
about.text:
In Israel, thousands of children live as orphans. Children who did not choose to be born into a painful silence that tries, in every way, to be filled. We believe that every such child deserves not only to survive, but to truly live â€“ to grow within a community, with emotional support, educational opportunities, and a sense of belonging.

The Mishpacha Association was established to provide exactly that. We are not a replacement â€“ we are a network of care and support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text:
We aspire to build a cross-sector community that provides every orphan in Israel with an equal starting point â€“ through education, professional support, and human guidance that connects hearts.

Together, we will create a network of belonging, presence, and care. Because even those who are left alone are not truly alone.
